Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Miscellaneous: Inhibits HIV-1 reverse transcriptase with an IC50 of 300 nM.
Sequence Information.Biophysicochemical properties: pH dependence (Optimum pH is 6-7); Temperature dependence (Optimum temperature is 45 degrees Celsius. Activity decreases sharply above 50 degrees Celsius and below 40 degrees Celsius).

Literature.Title: Purification of a novel ribonuclease from dried fruiting bodies of the edible wild mushroom Thelephora ganbajun.
Literature.Author: Wang HX, Ng TB.
